Header.title: Welcome to Insights Intellect
Header.paragraph: our aim is to centralize and enrich our client's data

About.paragraph: Insight Intellect is a division of Knowledge Factory, a Property Data and ICT company. We are a proudly black business with a B-BBEE status of level 1. The company was formed in 1997 and is now thriving for just over two decades
Why: We centralize and enrich our clients data
We secure and protect information irrespective of the size of the requirements.
We provide easy interpretation and insights into the clients data

Services.name: Visualization, Dashboards, & Reporting
Services.text: â€‹The purpose of Insight Intellect is to support better business decision making. It provides interactive visualizations with self-service business intelligence capabilities, where end users can create reports and dashboards by themselves, without having to depend on information technology staff or database administrators.

Services.name: BI Integration / Database Administration
Services.text: We centralize and enrich our clients data if they don't have the capabilities. We secure and protect information irrespective of the size of the requirements. This includes database design.

Services.name: Insights and Data Interpretation
Services.text: We provide easy interpretation and insights into the clients data which support a wide range of business decisions.
